### Tuesday

Please complete the following BEFORE class:

- Download [R for mac](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/macosx/) by clicking on the first .pkg link on the webpage.
- Download [Rstudio](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/)
- Complete the [Programming Basics](https://posit.cloud/learn/primers/1.2) primer from posit.

### Thursday

Please complete the following BEFORE class:

- Complete the [Visualization Basics](https://posit.cloud/learn/primers/1.1) primer from posit.
